title: Is it normal for a ticket created 7 days ago to still not have a response?
body: So I submitted a ticket 7 days ago, as you could guess from the title, I still haven't gotten a response. Does this normally happen or has something messed up in the system?

replies.body:
The short answer is no, but there are things that could cause such a wait.

1. Replying to a ticket or creating a new ticket before receiving a response will drop you back to the bottom of the queue.
2. If you were referred specifically to the player behaviour team, they are a much smaller (and much more specialised) team and can take significantly longer to respond as a result. A week is still a long time in that scenario, but not unheard of if they have a high ticket volume.
